Author: SpaceWhale88
Text: Your weight naturally ebs and flows a few pounds per day. There is literally no way to stay the exact same weight. The only way to keep your weight stable is to attempt to restrict less bc that will help with the uncontrollable binges where your brain takes over your body.

Author: publixbogo
Text: If you want to stop bingeing, you're probably going to have to stop restricting so severely. I know it's probably not what you want to hear but it's the truth. I'd calculate your TDEE and then eat at that level for at least a couple days before considering cutting your intake again.
